org.certificateservices.custom.c2x.its.generator

Class SecuredMessageGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.certificateservices.custom.c2x.its.generator.SecuredMessageGenerator

  • public class SecuredMessageGenerator
extends Object
    Generator to create secured messages.

    Encrypted messages are currently not supported

    If no method i suitable, it is possible to build the secured message manually and sign/encrypt it with the CryptoManager.

    Author:
    Philip Vendil, p.vendil@cgi.com

    • Constructor Detail

      • SecuredMessageGenerator

        public SecuredMessageGenerator(CryptoManager cryptoManager,
                       PublicKeyAlgorithm signingPublicKeyAlgorithm,
                       Certificate senderCertificate,
                       PrivateKey senderSigningPrivateKey,
                       PublicKeyAlgorithm encryptionPublicKeyAlgorithm,
                       PrivateKey senderDecryptionPrivateKey)
        Main constructor of a Secured Message Generator.
        Parameters:
        cryptoManager - the currently used CryptoManager
        senderCertificate - certificate used for sending of message.
        senderSigningPrivateKey - signing key used to send messages.
        encryptionPublicKeyAlgorithm - public algorithm used when encryption, null if no encrypted messages are used.
        senderDecryptionPrivateKey - this senders decryption key, null if no encrypted messages are used.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if invalid signerInfoType was specified.

    • Method Detail

      • genSignedCAMMessage

        public SecuredMessage genSignedCAMMessage(SignerInfoType signerInfoType,
                                 byte[] payLoad)
                                   throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                          SignatureException,
                                          IOException
        Method to generate a signed CAM message(not encrypted) with the following HeaderFields set.
      • generation_time (current time)
      • message_type (set to 2)
      • signer_info (certificate_digest_with_ecdsap256, certificate)
Parameters:
signerInfoType - indicates the type of SignerInfo inserted into generated messages, supported values are: certificate_digest_with_ecdsap256 or certificate.
payLoad - the payload to include in the message, null of empty payload (size 0).
Returns:
a signed SecuredMessage with header, payload and trailer fields set.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if supplied arguments was illegal.
SignatureException - if internal signature problems occurred.
IOException - if communication problems with underlying systems occurred generating the message.

  • genSignedCAMMessage

    public SecuredMessage genSignedCAMMessage(SignerInfoType signerInfoType,
                                 List<byte[]> payLoads)
                                   throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                          SignatureException,
                                          IOException
    Method to generate a signed CAM message(not encrypted) with the following HeaderFields set.
  • generation_time (current time)
  • message_type (set to 2)
  • signer_info (certificate_digest_with_ecdsap256, certificate)
Parameters:
signerInfoType - indicates the type of SignerInfo inserted into generated messages, supported values are: certificate_digest_with_ecdsap256 or certificate.
payLoads - A list of payload types to include in the message, null of emply payload.
Returns:
a signed SecuredMessage with header, payload and trailer fields set.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if supplied arguments was illegal.
SignatureException - if internal signature problems occurred.
IOException - if communication problems with underlying systems occurred generating the message.

  • genSignedCAMUnrecognizedCertificatesMessage

    public SecuredMessage genSignedCAMUnrecognizedCertificatesMessage(SignerInfoType signerInfoType,
                                                         List<HashedId3> unrecognizedCertificates)
                                                           throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                                                  SignatureException,
                                                                  IOException
    Method to generate a signed CAM message(not encrypted) with the following HeaderFields set.
  • generation_time (current time)
  • message_type (set to 2)
  • signer_info (certificate_digest_with_ecdsap256, certificate)
    Parameters:
    signerInfoType - indicates the type of SignerInfo inserted into generated messages, supported values are: certificate_digest_with_ecdsap256 or certificate.
    unrecognizedCertificates - A list of HashedId3 values of unrecognized certificates.
    Returns:
    a signed SecuredMessage with header, payload and trailer fields set.
    Throws:
    IllegalArgumentException - if supplied arguments was illegal.
    SignatureException - if internal signature problems occurred.
    IOException - if communication problems with underlying systems occurred generating the message.

  • genSignedDENMMessage

    public SecuredMessage genSignedDENMMessage(ThreeDLocation generationLocation,
                                  byte[] payLoad)
                                    throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                           SignatureException,
                                           IOException
    Method to generate a signed DENM message(not encrypted) with the following HeaderFields set.
  • generation_time (current time)
  • generation_location (given location)
  • message_type (set to 1)
  • signer_info (certificate)
    Parameters:
    generationLocation - the generation location used in the header field of the message.
    payLoad - the payload to include in the message or null for one empty payload
    Throws:
    IllegalArgumentException - if supplied arguments was illegal.
    SignatureException - if internal signature problems occurred.
    IOException - if communication problems with underlying systems occurred generating the message.

  • genSignedDENMMessage

    public SecuredMessage genSignedDENMMessage(ThreeDLocation generationLocation,
                                  List<byte[]> payLoads)
                                    throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                           SignatureException,
                                           IOException
    Method to generate a signed DENM message(not encrypted) with the following HeaderFields set.
  • generation_time (current time)
  • generation_location (given location)
  • message_type (set to 1)
  • signer_info (certificate)
    Parameters:
    generationLocation - the generation location used in the header field of the message.
    payLoads - a list of payload to include (all signed) in the message or null for one empty payload
    Throws:
    IllegalArgumentException - if supplied arguments was illegal.
    SignatureException - if internal signature problems occurred.
    IOException - if communication problems with underlying systems occurred generating the message.
